member.name: T:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail
member.summary: The complete description of a Magic the Gathering card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Name
member.summary: Unique card name.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.ManaCost
member.summary: Mana Cost of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.CMC
member.summary: Converted Mana Cost of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Colors
member.summary: Colors of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.ColorIdentity
member.summary: Color Identity of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Type
member.summary: Type of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Types
member.summary: Types of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Subtypes
member.summary: Subtypes of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Supertypes
member.summary: Supertypes of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Rarity
member.summary: Rarity of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Set
member.summary: Abbriated Set name this card appeared in.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.SetName
member.summary: SetName of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Text
member.summary: Functional card Text.
member.example: "Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. You may repeat this process any number of times."

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Flavor
member.summary: Flavor text of this card.
member.example: "When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work."

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Artist
member.summary: Artist of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Number
member.summary: Number of this card within the set it appears in.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Power
member.summary: Power of this card, if its type is creature.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Toughness
member.summary: Toughness of this card, if its type is creature.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Layout
member.summary: Layout of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Watermark
member.summary: Watermark of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Rulings
member.summary: Date/Text pairs of rulings for this card.
member.example: ["Date:2008-10-01,Text:Each time you put the revealed card into your hand and lose the appropriate amount of life, you decide whether to continue by revealing another card. In other words, you donâ€™t decide in advance how many cards to put into your hand this way."]

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.Printings
member.summary: Printings of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.OriginalText
member.summary: OriginalText of this card.
member.example: "Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times."

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.OriginalType
member.summary: OriginalType of this card.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardDetail.LegalFormats
member.summary: Sanctioned formats where this card can be legally played.

member.summary: The image of a Magic the Gathering card.

member.summary: Type of image.

member.name: P:ProxyAPI.Models.CardImage.FileContents
member.summary: The image binary data represented as a byte array.
